dict.acceptation: 时刻表，进度表；清单，明细表；预定计划；目录；
排定，安排；将…列表；为…作目录；

sent.orig: You can prevent an endless loop by inserting schedule invocations at strategic points.
sent.trans: 你可以在代码中适当的位置插入schedule语句来防止进入死循环。

sent.orig: Don't worry. My friend says he can always arrange his schedule around your schedule.
sent.trans: 别担心，我朋友说他会按你的计划来调整他的时间。

sent.orig: To acquainted with the Project Master Schedule and the purchasing schedule the assigned project.
sent.trans: 熟知项目总体计划及项目的采购计划。

sent.orig: Next, the courtyard line suggestion's running schedule, is the very scientific reasonable running schedule.
sent.trans: 其次，院线建议的档期，是非常科学合理的档期。

sent.orig: See the attached schedule or as per the attached schedule.
